birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝浙江省宁波府奉化县溪口镇
birth_place.en: Xikou, Fenghua, Ningbo, Zhejiang, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市士林区士林官邸
death_place.en: Shilin Official Residence, Shilin District, Taipei, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事人物。历任黄埔军校校长、国民革命军总司令、国民政府主席、国民政府军事委员会委员长、中国国民党总裁、中华民国总统等职务，是中华民国大陆时期的实际最高领导人及迁台后的台湾统治者。
description.en: A political and military figure of the Republic of China. He held positions such as Commandant of the Whampoa Military Academy, Commander-in-Chief of the National Revolutionary Army, Chairman of the Nationalist Government, Chairman of the Nationalist Military Council, Director-General of the Kuomintang, and President of the Republic of China. He was the de facto leader of the Republic of China on the mainland and later the ruler of Taiwan after the government's relocation.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创始人，中华民国国父。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, founder of the Kuomintang, and the founding father of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正的原配妻子，蒋经国的生母。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek's first wife and the biological mother of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正的第四任妻子，中华民国前第一夫人。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek's fourth wife and the former First Lady of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正的长子，中华民国第六、七任总统。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek's eldest son, and the 6th and 7th President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 近代民主革命家，蒋中正的早期导师和盟友。
description.en: A modern democratic revolutionary, and an early mentor and ally of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党早期领导人之一，后在抗日战争期间投靠日本，建立汪精卫政权。
description.en: An early leader of the Kuomintang who later collaborated with Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War and established the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀首领张作霖之子，东北军领袖，发动西安事变。
description.en: Son of Fengtian warlord Zhang Zuolin, leader of the Northeastern Army, and initiator of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 西北军将领，与张学良共同发动西安事变。
description.en: A general of the Northwestern Army who, along with Zhang Xueliang, initiated the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 新桂系首领，中华民国首任副总统及末任代总统。
description.en: Leader of the New Guangxi clique, the first Vice President and last acting President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 二战时期美国陆军将领，曾任同盟国中国战区参谋长，与蒋中正关系不睦。
description.en: A US Army general during World War II who served as Chief of Staff in the China-Burma-India Theater and had a contentious relationship with Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山创立的中华民国主要政党，蒋中正长期担任其最高领导人。
description.en: The main political party of the Republic of China, founded by Sun Yat-sen, with Chiang Kai-shek serving as its paramount leader for a long period.

nodes.id: 中华民国陆军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山创办、蒋中正担任首任校长的军事院校，为国民革命军培养了大量军事骨干，在国共两党中均有深远影响。
description.en: A military academy founded by Sun Yat-sen with Chiang Kai-shek as its first commandant. It trained many military cadres for the National Revolutionary Army and had a profound influence on both the Kuomintang and the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1948年间中华民国的中央政府，蒋中正长期担任其最高领导人。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948, with Chiang Kai-shek serving as its paramount leader for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在训政时期的国家武装力量，蒋中正曾任其总司令。
description.en: The national armed forces of the Kuomintang during the Tutelage Period, with Chiang Kai-shek once serving as its Commander-in-Chief.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国抗日战争结束后爆发的大规模内战，以国民党失败、中华民国政府迁台告终。
description.en: A large-scale civil war between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China that broke out after the end of the Second Sino-Japanese War, ending with the defeat of the Kuomintang and the relocation of the Republic of China government to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1936年张学良和杨虎城在西安发动的“兵谏”，扣押蒋中正，迫使其停止内战、联共抗日。
description.en: A 'remonstrance by military force' initiated by Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng in Xi'an in 1936, where they detained Chiang Kai-shek, forcing him to stop the civil war and form a united front with the Communists to resist Japan.

description.zh-cn: 由国民政府发动，蒋中正担任总司令，旨在推翻北洋军阀统治、统一中国的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the Nationalist Government with Chiang Kai-shek as Commander-in-Chief, aiming to overthrow the Beiyang warlords and unify China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30至40年代中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争，蒋中正是中国战区的最高统帅。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale invasion by Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s. Chiang Kai-shek was the supreme commander of the China Theatre.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国家元首的官衔。
description.en: The official title of the head of state of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 日本陆军参谋本部为清国留学生设立的军事预备学校。
description.en: A military preparatory school in Japan established by the Imperial Japanese Army General Staff Office for Chinese students.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由孙中山等组织的革命团体，中国国民党的前身。
description.en: A revolutionary group organized by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing Dynasty, the predecessor of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 近代民主革命家，光复会主要领导人之一，因派系之争被暗杀。
description.en: A modern democratic revolutionary and a key leader of the Guangfuhui, who was assassinated due to factional disputes.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期军事及政治人物，曾与孙中山合作，后因政治理念不合而决裂。
description.en: A military and political figure in the early Republic of China who initially collaborated with Sun Yat-sen but later broke with him over political differences.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正以中山舰异动为由，在广州实行紧急戒严，打击中国共产党和国民党左派，巩固其个人权力的事件。
description.en: An event in which Chiang Kai-shek, citing the unusual movement of the Zhongshan Warship, imposed martial law in Guangzhou to suppress the Communist Party and the Kuomintang left-wing, thereby consolidating his personal power.

description.zh-cn: 由蒋中正等国民党右派在上海发动的针对中国共产党人的大规模清剿行动，标志着第一次国共合作破裂。
description.en: A large-scale purge of Communists in Shanghai launched by Chiang Kai-shek and other KMT right-wing figures, marking the breakdown of the First United Front.

description.zh-cn: 1930年国民政府内部爆发的规模最大的军阀混战，以蒋中正的中央军胜利告终。
description.en: The largest warlord conflict within the Nationalist Government in 1930, ending in victory for Chiang Kai-shek's central army.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正在九一八事变后制定的国策，主张在抵抗日本侵略前，先要平定国内的中国共产党势力。
description.en: A national policy formulated by Chiang Kai-shek after the Mukden Incident, advocating for the pacification of internal Communist forces before resisting Japanese aggression.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正领导的国民党政府在台湾实施长期的戒严，期间对持不同政见者进行大规模的逮捕、监禁、乃至处决。
description.en: A long period of martial law in Taiwan under Chiang Kai-shek's KMT government, characterized by the mass arrest, imprisonment, and execution of political dissidents.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛爆发的战争。此战爆发后，美国派遣第七舰队协防台湾，使蒋中正政权得以稳固。
description.en: A war that broke out on the Korean Peninsula. After its outbreak, the United States dispatched the Seventh Fleet to help defend Taiwan, which stabilized Chiang Kai-shek's regime.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国与美国在1954年签订的军事同盟条约，旨在共同防御来自中华人民共和国的军事威胁。
description.en: A military alliance treaty signed in 1954 between the Republic of China and the United States, aimed at mutual defense against military threats from the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，在二战期间是中华民国的盟友，在国共内战后及冷战期间是蒋中正政府在台湾的主要支持者。
description.en: The United States of America, an ally of the Republic of China during World War II and the main supporter of Chiang Kai-shek's government in Taiwan after the Chinese Civil War and during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正于1901年与毛福梅结婚，她是蒋的原配妻子。两人于1921年离婚。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek married Mao Fumei in 1901; she was his first wife. They divorced in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正于1927年与宋美龄结婚，直至其1975年去世。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek married Soong Mei-ling in 1927, and they remained married until his death in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国是蒋中正与毛福梅所生的长子。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo was the eldest son of Chiang Kai-shek and Mao Fumei.

description.zh-cn: 陈其美是蒋中正早期的革命导师和盟友，介绍蒋加入了中国同盟会。
description.en: Chen Qimei was an early revolutionary mentor and ally to Chiang Kai-shek, introducing him to the Tongmenghui.

description.zh-cn: 1908年由陈其美介绍加入中国同盟会。
description.en: Joined the Tongmenghui in 1908, introduced by Chen Qimei.

description.zh-cn: 1908年春至1910年底，在东京振武学校学习军事。
description.en: From spring 1908 to the end of 1910, he studied military science at the Tokyo Shimbun Gakko.

description.zh-cn: 1912年，奉陈其美之命在上海广慈医院暗杀了光复会首领陶成章。
description.en: In 1912, under the orders of Chen Qimei, he assassinated Tao Chengzhang, the leader of the Guangfuhui, at the Guangci Hospital in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陈炯明发动武装政变，炮轰总统府，导致孙中山避往永丰舰。
description.en: Chen Jiongming launched an armed coup, bombarding the Presidential Palace, forcing Sun Yat-sen to take refuge on the warship Yongfeng.

description.zh-cn: 在陈炯明事件中，蒋中正赶赴永丰舰协助孙中山，赢得了孙的绝对信任和重用。
description.en: During the Chen Jiongming Incident, Chiang Kai-shek rushed to the Yongfeng warship to assist Sun Yat-sen, winning Sun's absolute trust and reliance.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 孙中山创办了黄埔军校，以建立革命武装力量。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen founded the Whampoa Military Academy to build a revolutionary armed force.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 经孙中山任命，担任黄埔军校首任校长。
description.en: Appointed by Sun Yat-sen, he served as the first Commandant of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正利用中山舰事件，打击了中国共产党和国民党左派，巩固了个人在党内的军事和政治权力。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek used the Zhongshan Warship Incident to suppress the Communist Party and the KMT left-wing, consolidating his military and political power within the party.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正担任国民革命军总司令，领导北伐战争以统一中国。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek served as Commander-in-Chief of the National Revolutionary Army, leading the Northern Expedition to unify China.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正在上海发动“四一二事件”，清剿中国共产党党员，导致第一次国共合作破裂。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek launched the 'April 12 Incident' in Shanghai, purging members of the Communist Party of China, which led to the collapse of the First United Front.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正领导的中央军在中原大战中战胜了阎锡山、冯玉祥等地方军阀的联合进攻，巩固了南京国民政府的统治。
description.en: The Central Army led by Chiang Kai-shek defeated the coalition of regional warlords such as Yan Xishan and Feng Yuxiang in the Central Plains War, consolidating the rule of the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 在九一八事变后，蒋中正制定并推行“攘外必先安内”的国策，优先清剿国内的共产党势力。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Chiang Kai-shek formulated and implemented the national policy of 'first internal pacification, then external resistance,' prioritizing the suppression of domestic Communist forces.

description.zh-cn: 与杨虎城共同发动西安事变，扣押了蒋中正，逼其同意停止内战、联共抗日。
description.en: Along with Yang Hucheng, launched the Xi'an Incident, detaining Chiang Kai-shek and forcing him to agree to stop the civil war and form a united front with the Communists to resist Japan.

description.zh-cn: 与张学良共同发动西安事变，扣押了蒋中正。
description.en: Along with Zhang Xueliang, launched the Xi'an Incident, detaining Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变结束后，蒋中正将护送其返回南京的张学良长期软禁。
description.en: After the Xi'an Incident, Chiang Kai-shek placed Zhang Xueliang, who had escorted him back to Nanjing, under long-term house arrest.

position.zh-cn: 同盟国中国战区最高统帅
position.en: Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in the China Theatre

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争全面爆发后，蒋中正作为中国的最高军事统帅，领导了全国的对日作战。
description.en: After the full-scale outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Chiang Kai-shek, as the supreme military commander of China, led the nationwide war effort against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 在汪精卫投靠日本并建立伪政权后，蒋中正领导的重庆国民政府下令将其开除党籍并予以通缉，视其为叛国者。
description.en: After Wang Jingwei defected to Japan and established a puppet regime, the Chongqing Nationalist Government led by Chiang Kai-shek ordered his expulsion from the party and issued a warrant for his arrest, regarding him as a traitor.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正与担任中国战区参谋长的史迪威在军事指挥权和战略上存在严重分歧，关系恶劣，最终蒋成功迫使罗斯福将其撤换。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek had severe disagreements with Joseph Stilwell, the Chief of Staff for the China Theatre, over military command authority and strategy. Their relationship was poor, and Chiang eventually succeeded in pressuring Roosevelt to have him replaced.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战中，蒋中正领导的国民党军队最终战败，导致其领导的中华民国政府退守台湾。
description.en: In the Second Chinese Civil War, the Nationalist forces led by Chiang Kai-shek were ultimately defeated, forcing the Republic of China government under his leadership to retreat to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正迁台后，为巩固统治，实行长期戒严，主导了对政治异见者的大规模镇压，即“白色恐怖”时期。
description.en: After retreating to Taiwan, Chiang Kai-shek imposed long-term martial law to consolidate his rule, leading the large-scale suppression of political dissidents known as the 'White Terror' period.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争爆发后，美国出于冷战战略需要，派遣第七舰队协防台湾，使蒋中正在台湾的政权得以免受军事攻击并获得美援，从而得以稳固。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Korean War, the United States, for Cold War strategic reasons, dispatched the Seventh Fleet to help defend Taiwan. This protected Chiang Kai-shek's regime from military attack and secured US aid, thus stabilizing it.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争爆发后，蒋中正政府与美国建立军事同盟关系，并签订《中美共同防御条约》，在冷战期间获得美国的大力支持。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Korean War, Chiang Kai-shek's government established a military alliance with the United States, signing the Sino-American Mutual Defense Treaty and receiving significant US support during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正于1948年当选为中华民国第一任总统，后因国共内战失利下野。1950年在台湾复职，并连任四届，直至1975年去世。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was elected the first President of the Republic of China in 1948, but stepped down after setbacks in the Chinese Civil War. He resumed office in Taiwan in 1950 and was re-elected for four consecutive terms until his death in 1975.
